column5: I’m completely with you. It seems like even the people who say “if you need me let me know” don’t really want to listen. I over analyze everything, and replay past mistakes over and over. That’s really why I come here. I don’t feel like I’m burdening anyone with my emotional load and if people don’t want to listen, they can just keep scrolling. Hang in there. I’ll listen to you.
Going to bed is the worst time for me. It’s when all of the irrational fears pop up. And it’s when some of the movies start playing in my head
